description: Identifier of the application user this access record pertains to; used to join user profiles when evaluating permissions.
Code of the specific feature or module for which access is controlled within the fleet management system.
Permission level or set of allowed actions for the user on the referenced feature (likely read/create/update/delete flags or role mask; confirm with SME).
User account or system process that originally granted or recorded this permission entry.
Timestamp when the permission entry was created, used for audit and effective-dating.
User account or system process that last modified this permission entry.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this permission entry, for audit tracking.
